TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellStyle extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示套用至 控制項內個別儲存格的格式化和樣式資訊。

span.span: Represents the formatting and style information applied to individual cells within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您跨多個共用的樣式資訊資料格、 資料列、 資料行和資料列或資料行標頭，避免設定個別的儲存格樣式屬性的記憶體需求。The class lets you share style information across multiple cells, rows, columns, and row or column headers, avoiding the memory requirements of setting style properties on individual cells. 如需類別類型的內容以及如何它們互相關聯，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about classes that have a property of type and how they relate to each other, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在多個設定屬性的效果物件。The following code example demonstrates the effect of setting properties on multiple objects. 這個範例會設定中的資料格的背景色彩藉由設定屬性屬性。This example sets the background color of cells in the by setting the property on the property. 在替代資料列，因為覆寫的背景色彩上設定屬性屬性。The background color is overridden on alternating rows because the property is set on the property. 此範例也會判斷命名的資料行中的日期格式`Last Prepared`藉由設定屬性的資料行上屬性。The example also determines the format of dates in the column named `Last Prepared` by setting the property on the column's property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataSourceNullValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當使用者輸入 null 值到儲存格時儲存到資料來源中的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value saved to the data source when the user enters a null value into a cell.

value.span: 當使用者指定 null 儲存格值時儲存到資料來源中的值。

span.span: The value saved to the data source when the user specifies a null cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以輸入 null 值在資料格中按下 CTRL + 0，或輸入的值屬性。The user can enter a null value into a cell by pressing CTRL+0 or by typing the value of the property. 當使用者認可變更時，基礎資料格的值設定為值的屬性或`null`如果是和儲存格是參考型別。When the user commits the change, the underlying cell value is set to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 當您將不會發生這種轉換屬性以程式設計的方式。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不會顯示屬性值的資料格的值等於屬性值時以外設定為值或`null`。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在此情況下，您可以處理事件 以顯示屬性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此範例中，事件處理常式中顯示的值屬性時儲存格的值等於。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/cs/misc2.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/vb/misc2.vb#50)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Font ^ Font { System::Drawing::Font ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Font ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 儲存格的文字內容所套用的字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the font applied to the textual content of a cell.
The applied to the cell text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來變更套用至資料格文字的字型樣式。You can use this property to change the typeface styles applied to the cell text. 因為是不變 （其屬性是唯讀），您可以修改此屬性只是藉由指派新的或現有的給它; 您無法直接改變傳回物件的屬性。Because a is immutable (its properties are read-only), you can modify this property only by assigning a new or existing to it; you cannot alter the properties of the returned object directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定資料行標頭的字型。The following code example sets the font for column headers. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`GridView1`，然後呼叫`SetupUpDataGridView`和`PopulateDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `GridView1`, and then call the `SetupUpDataGridView` and `PopulateDataGridView` methods from the form's constructor or method. 確定所有事件與事件處理方法相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常應該指定一個色彩的相反屬性。The property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定和替代資料列中的儲存格的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the and properties for cells in alternating rows. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 儲存格的文字內容所套用的格式字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the format string applied to the textual content of a cell.

value.span: 表示儲存格值之格式的字串。

span.span: A string that indicates the format of the cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定如何格式化儲存格的值為字串。The property specifies how cell values are formatted as strings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[格式類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定日期的格式命名的資料行中`Last Fixed`至 「 月、 年 」 藉由設定屬性的資料行上屬性。The following code example sets the format of dates in the column named `Last Fixed` to "Month, year" by setting the property on the column's property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷是否屬性明確設定而不必儲存它的預設值進行比較。Use this property to determine whether the property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison. 這非常有用因為屬性有非空白的預設值，不同於其他大部分屬性，其具有預設值，例如`null`， ，或。This is useful because the property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other properties, which have default values such as `null`, , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當此儲存格樣式的資料格的值為或`null`或使用者編輯儲存格，並按下 CTRL + 0、控制顯示屬性值。When a cell with this cell style has a value of or `null` or the user edits the cell and presses CTRL+0, the control displays the property value. 控制使用者編輯與這個儲存格樣式的資料格和進入這個屬性的值，或按下 CTRL + 0，將儲存格的值設定為值的屬性或`null`如果是和儲存格是參考型別。When a user edits a cell with this cell style and enters the value of this property or presses CTRL+0, the control sets the cell value to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 當您將不會發生這種轉換屬性以程式設計的方式。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不會顯示屬性值的資料格的值等於屬性值時以外設定為值或`null`。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在此情況下，您可以處理事件 以顯示屬性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. 此屬性會接受可讓您使用適用於資料格的顯示類型指定值的任何物件。This property takes any object, which enables you to specify a value with a type appropriate to the display type of the cell. 比方說，您可以設定這個屬性所使用的字串值來文字方塊儲存格的映像，以使用影像資料格。For example, you can set this property to string values for use by text box cells or images for use by image cells. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此範例中，事件處理常式中顯示的值屬性時儲存格的值等於。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Padding Padding { System::Windows::Forms::Padding get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Padding value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定介於 的邊緣與其內容之間的空格。

span.span: Gets or sets the space between the edge of a and its content.

value.span: ，表示介於 的邊緣與其內容之間的空格。

span.span: A that represents the space between the edge of a and its content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性會影響 where，編輯控制項的繪製。Setting the property affects where the editing control of the is drawn. 比方說，如果您設定上至具有值為 10 的其， ， ，和中間以空格的儲存格繪製屬性，儲存格的內容10 之間的像素的文字方塊邊緣和儲存格邊緣。For example, if you set on a to a that has a value of 10 for its , , , and properties, the content of the cell is drawn in the middle of the cell with a space of 10 pixels between the edges of the text box and the edges of the cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用包含描繪資料列的控制。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control that contains owner-drawn rows. 每個資料列會顯示一般儲存格內容底下的資料列的整個寬度的文字。Each row displays text that spans the entire width of the row underneath the regular cell content. 屬性用來提供額外的空間，此文字。The property is used to provide the extra space for this text. 在範例中，所需的額外高度會儲存在稱為常數`CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT`。In the example, the extra height required is stored in a constant called `CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT`. 這個程式碼範例是較大範例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example. 完整的範例，請參閱[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常應該指定一個色彩的相反屬性。The property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，有數種，在自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways, and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當 儲存格中的文字內容太長而無法置於一行時，是否要將它換行或截斷它。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether textual content in a cell is wrapped to subsequent lines or truncated when it is too long to fit on a single line.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是資料格包含文字的資料格會顯示在單一行中的文字，而顯示為方塊字元的任何內嵌的新行字元。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays the text on a single line, and displays any embedded newline characters as box characters. 如果是資料格包含文字的資料格會顯示新行字元行發生中斷，但也會包裝任何程式碼行超出資料格的寬度。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays newline characters as line breaks, but also wraps any lines that exceed the width of the cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
